title: Your opinion on PESU
content: I'm a 12 student who got into interview in PES and i have applied for BBA LLB, i would like to know how the college is for law and generally how the management and other things are.

comments.body:
Management barely gives a fuck about the student unless it's about fees. They only care about their reputation on TV.  This can be seen with the callousness they treated the suicides. Javahar actually laughed during an orientation addressing this. 
If you meant the management course then idk.
Wait, can you explain me more about Jawahar laughing it off?
One of the suicides in campus was due to some 'love problem'. Man dismissed all the other suicides with  making fun of this one.
That's messed up, but after hearing about the recent news, I almost wonder if what happened was an act of karma...
Don't think that man. God know he's become more deranged now that he owns the university in name as well
i got in for ba llb. all i’ve heard is that it’s new and they have their own building and stuff. haven’t heard much ab faculty tho
